sections.heading: Terms, defined.For purposes of sections 83-108 and 83-391 to 83-393, unless the context otherwise requires:(1) Department means the Department of Health and Human Services; and(2) Facility means a skilled nursing care or intermediate care facility
sections.text: SourceLaws 1973, LB 536, ยง 1;Laws 1996, LB 1044, ยง 9
